title: # 474 - Chris Porter & ME
description:
Today, I sit down and share an entire bottle with Chris Porter. We talk about lucid dreams, how Chris became friends with Kid Rock, cross fit, getting in fights at concerts, trespassing, weed, and much more! 

 

Check out Chris’s special “A Man From Kansas” on Amazon here: https://www.amazon.com/Chris-Porter-Man-Kansas/dp/B07NXQM2J7 

 

Follow Halston on instagram here: https://www.instagram.com/halstonrays 

 

This episode is brought to you by Hims. Go to http://www.forhims.com/bertcast for your free visit.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Credit Karma. Go to http://www.creditKarma.com/podcast and find offers tailored just for you.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Podium. Go to http://www.podium.com/Bert and get started today for free. 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Birddogs. Enter promo code “BERT” and get a free Whistle Tip Football at http://www.birddogs.com  

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
